Name: Roller Champions™
About the game: Skate, tackle, and roll your way up to glory in Roller Champions™. Discover a free-to-play, team PvP sports game like no other! Welcome to 2032. Arenas are built all over the world and fans rush to the stands to admire their modern-day heroes, the Roller Champions. They roll up to 100 miles an hour, tackle opponents, wall-skate, and dunk while thousands of fans scream their names. As a Roller Champion, compete in a team of three against three. The rules are simple: take the ball, make a lap while maintaining team possession, dodge opponents, and score. Go for more points by completing additional laps before attempting a goal. After each match, gain fans to compete in bigger arenas. Customize characters and create a unique destiny. GATHER YOUR TEAM AND COMPETE Team up with two players and dive into Roller Champions’ gameplay, which combines fun competitive action and collaborative team play. Go head-to-head against the opposing team through speed, wit, crushing tackles, and daring dodges to lap around the arena and be the first team to reach 5 points by throwing the ball through the hoop. Feel the thrill of riding up and down the wall of the arena as you gain speed, quickly stop, pivot, and re-position as your teammates race towards the goal, just one pass away from winning or one interception away from having to start all over again. FROM ZERO TO HERO – BUILD A LIFE OF A WORLD-RENOWNED ATHLETE Write your own legend. Start your sports career as the underdog and roll up to glory as you win matches. Obtain more fans in arena bleachers as you complete spectacular actions and progress to bigger stadiums. Write your name in Roller Champions’ history books as you climb up the leaderboards. Progress through Roller Champions’ ranked mode from Garage league all the way to the Elite Champions’ league. Compete in thrilling time-limited special game mode to gain fans or special lootballs. CREATE AND FULLY CUSTOMIZE YOUR SPORT LEGEND Create your own character and customize your outfit as you progress. Unlock new items, including skates, helmets, fresh attires, gloves, goal effects, emotes, air poses, player titles and banners. Progress through the Roller Pass to gain season-exclusive items, spectacular goal FX and emotes, lootballs and in-game currency (wheels). COME HANG IN THE SKATEPARK Roller Champions’ social hub is THE place to be to meet up and learn the ropes with your friends! Roll around, practice scoring and learn new tricks. Participate to time-limited minigames.
Meta Title: Roller Champions™: Dec 13, 2022, Ubisoft and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Roller Champions™? Check out the release date (Dec 13, 2022), developer insights from Ubisoft, and a complete game summary.
